org.ljtoolkit.client
Class LJClientEventWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.ljtoolkit.client.LJClientEventWriter

public class LJClientEventWriter
extends java.lang.Object

The purpose of this class is to support output of the Live Journal Client list events option. A list of the user's Live Journal events are pretty printed to stdout.

Author:
Troy Bourdon
